website_summaries.verdict: This generous set of flameless tea light candles is ideal for events and comes in 3 color options to suit every occasion.
pros: Very reasonably priced with each set offering 24 tea light candles
Flicker effect and uneven edges add a touch of realism
Conveniently come with pre-installed batteries for out-of-the-box use
cons: No remote and no additional settings

customer_reviews.title: Not warm white
customer_reviews.text: These are not bad looking and they do very mildly flicker, but they are not warm white. They look more like a traditional LED. I was hoping they would look like a real candle and the color of the light just isn’t right. I attached a photo with real candles on the left and these fake tea lights in the right. You can see the color difference. I’ll be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Lovely! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used these LED votives in party centerpieces. They looked wonderful. Here's what I liked about them: 1. The top edges are uneven, which makes them look like real votive candles. 2. They have on-off switches, so you can save battery/ bulb life. (Apparently, the battery can be replaced.) 3. These "candles" emit a decent amount of light ... not some anemic flame. 4. The light flickers, just like real candles. 5. LED candles are safer than real candles. 6. The price was right.
customer_reviews.author: La Famiglia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flicker with realustic look
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat customer. Super fast shipping. 100% of those we purchased worked, which was a wonderful outcome. These flickering candles have great realistic appearance in flame color and flicker, and overall appearance. The flickering flame shows up well through our silver mercury glass votive holders. Great value. We will be purchasing more for an upcoming family wedding reception. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are beautiful! They are a white light, not yellow or orange. They flicker like a real candle. All the lights I received are in working order. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: momto4

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a more realistic set of led tealights. I have some from Walmart that are too orange. These ones are too white. I took a picture of both with an actual tea light. As you can see, these have an almost greenish look next to the real thing. I think whoever eventually makes one with just a hint of peachy pink to it is gonna corner the market.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Luminary Bags or Carved Pumpkins
customer_reviews.text: These worked out great inside the paper luminary bags lining our driveway this Halloween. All 24 worked perfectly out of the box, no battery fiddling required. They have a pleasing natural flicker and warm glow which make them a pretty convincing mimic for real candlelight when placed out of direct sight in a tinted container or pumpkin. The box they arrive in has a flip top with tuck in tabs on the sides, which was a nice perk when it came time to pack them up for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mitten Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great size, look and value! So happy I purchased these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great candles! I had been researching led flameless candles for weeks and based on a couple helpful reviews settled on these. They are even better in person than in the photos! Very authentic looking and I love the soft white light this candle gives. If you are on the fence, buy them! For the price you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Provides Amazing Ambiance
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had taken more photos of the many ways we used these little beauties in my sister's Bridal Lounge on her wedding day. They were a very romantic touch to the rooms. So romantic, in fact, that the bride took them on her honeymoon. I would highly recommend these tea lights. The packaging was professional, the operation was brilliant, and the quality was superb. Can't go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent produce and great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter's graduation party to serve as centerpieces in a votive. We had them on for about 4 hours on her party, no failures. I still have the votives and tea lights so for Christmas I thought it would be a nice touch to have them by the stockings and various places. I turned them on about 6pm on Christmas Eve and they are still going!!!!! Some are a little faint but most are going strong. So impressive, these were a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: schat

customer_reviews.title: We had 4 that were bad right off the top
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking. We had 4 that were bad right off the top. I would stay away
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Best fake candles ever!
customer_reviews.text: We're tired of smoke and soot and melted wax! Great price for 24 candles that could put around the house for the holidays. The batteries last long, but are also readily and reasonably cheap in bulk packaging. The flicker is good enough for us. I even drilled into a wax candle to allow placement of the LED tea light into the top - great effect! We're very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Leitner

customer_reviews.title: Great candles for most purposes
customer_reviews.text: We bought these instead of real candles for Halloween. Three candles were bright enough, had a long battery life, and worked for weeks. On top of Halloween, our kids now take them to bed for night lights and play with them during the day too. They've lasted really well! I use a couple on my table center piece too, instead of real candles since we have small kids and I don't want to risk fire around them yet. I would defnitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Candles
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful. Not too yellow or too white. Perfect warm white. I’ve only used it once so I don’t know how long the battery last but so far I like the candles. I bought one set then bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weddings
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my wedding. We used them as is, in jars and and in votives. Even by themselves they are appealing.. way more appealing than the old school, plain Jane tea lights. We left them on first thing when we set up and they were on all day and shut off late that night after the wedding.. not near the 100 hours that’s listed so I cannot confirm that, but they lasted for what we needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Dekle

customer_reviews.title: Good price, very nice light
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice led candles. The light color is more realistic than many out there, it's a warm amber. The price for the pack is super reasonable too. I left them on over night once and those few are still working on original batteries. Even if they fail soon I would buy them again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: barley1999

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how bright the light was and I loved how it flickered like a real candle. I used these for my Sunday School class before Christmas and used them as lighting on the tables rather than the classroom light. They weren't the low soft white light I was thinking they were going to be. They were very nice and bright!
customer_reviews.author: mbcakes

customer_reviews.title: It's nice when something is quality these days
customer_reviews.text: They arrives on time, well packaged, undamaged. They were what they advertised, looked nice and worked well. All rarities these days. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best Flameless Tealight Candles!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a wedding & to be used with my silver mercury glass votives holders. Love these flameless tea lights! These fit perfectly in the holders, emits a realistic warm white light that’s not orangey like other ones & flickers. I was impressed & ended up purchasing another set to be used at home!
customer_reviews.author: hammy sandwich

customer_reviews.title: Best product for tea lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 2 years ago. And I am impressed with the quality of the product. I love the white light effect over those yellow glow ones in the stores. And love buying in quantity, to have them when needed. I also like the easy to store boxes the tea lights came in, just the right fir to store in a drawer or in my closet till I am ready to use them. The replacement batteries are easy to find in most local stores that have a battery or watch dept or buy in quantity online.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a no-brainer Buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price These are nice little candles. Weather entertaining or just trying to make the bedroom a little more romantic this will get the job done
customer_reviews.author: cdewitte

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Cutest things ever! Ordered for game night and lined the tables and basically made a landing strip on the floor and it was great- very subtle flickering allows for realism.
customer_reviews.author: QueenCornelious

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They looked amazing, but the batteries were going dead within an hour of the first time using them at our memorial service inside.
customer_reviews.author: M. Greenside

customer_reviews.title: Perfect candles!
customer_reviews.text: These candles came super fast, which I originally ordered for our wedding reception. We are now using them out with our Christmas decorations and they have already lasted weeks!! The flicker of flame is beautiful and no one knew these were fake at our reception! Ordering more now to have extras for other decor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Newman

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect size. The flicker flame is nice. They last a long time- I somehow had several turned on in a table votive holder that is on a table that we don't see that often. When I realized they were on they had been lit for days but still bright and flickering.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Mikesell

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and a very good value.
customer_reviews.text: These were a snap to use. Many I have purchased in the past you had to take off cover, insert batter and put cover back on. This was a pain as sometimes the battery didn't seat in well and you had to do it all over again. Took forever! Not these, just flip a switch. Took me less than 3 minutes to set out over 50 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lorre & Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, reliable, and long-lasting batteries
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in bulk for our wedding reception tables, and they were not only beautiful, but lasted all through the night no problem. So I put them in our halloween pumpkins and just left them on - for WEEKS - and they were still going strong. Would highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beara

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these lights as the centerpiece of three holiday dinner tables. Still going strong so already worth the price as compared to the same number of real candles. We'll see if they're still working for next year's dinners.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Quite good lights for the price
customer_reviews.text: Quite good lights for the price. I use them when I need a quick night-light in dark rooms. I wish they were a little easier to turn on (switch at the bottom can be hard to find in the dark, it would be cool if you could just tap them anywhere). They don't replicate the look of real candles but nothing really does. These at least don't have the fire risk.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Romantic Candles
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect for a romantic evening with my wife. They flickered to resemble a real lit candle, and while they’re not perfect replicas, they were perfect for making the magic happening ;). Oh, I bought these along with a vanilla scented candle, and i bought fake rose petals as well. I thought the overall experience, with these candles, was great... she thought it was perfect. A success gentlemen!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a wedding
customer_reviews.text: Used these at my wedding and they worked great. We put them in votive candle holders and it looked like a real candle. Packaged well and batteries seem to be long lasting (we turned them on before the wedding and they stayed on through the reception with no issues).
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: They do flicker and I find that charming.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun little lights, they illuminate brighter than I thought. I only turn them on during special moments so cannot attest to the battery life just yet. They do flicker and I find that charming!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Best LED tea lights I have seen
customer_reviews.text: These look more realistic than most of the other LED tea lights I have seen. The faint flicker effect is not overdone. It looks "right" . I have bought these multiple times and would buy them again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: conservative dad

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: They are great! They look nice, and if you look close kinda resemble cheap plastic, but that's what I needed! They are bright enough to make some nice mood lighting, and combined with other decorations they look great. Even the flicker is nice and tasteful. Great value for what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our house to add some ambient light effect in the evenings. They have worked great so far. I set out 6 around our living room and turned them on. They all lasted a full month without ever being turned off before the batteries started to fade. I have other batteries to replace, but just set out the others for now.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Scalf

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT warm white
customer_reviews.text: Nice lights, but definitely NOT warm white. These are the cool white LEDs. My box says warm white, but I'm not sure they really know what that means. Nothing like a candle flame.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I put these lights in glass votives. They add just the right amount of subtle light for a party. You are not duplicating candlelight but they are so much safer to use and don't blow out in wind.
customer_reviews.author: luvs2read

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute, and light up a space you are trying to decorate. I am not sure how long battery life would last - we've only had them on for a few hours. But they sure glow nicely.
customer_reviews.author: LargeOne

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We passed these out to children for our Christmas Eve Candlelight Service last year. They were such a hit that we ordered more to do the same this year.
customer_reviews.author: JoyceMR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glow
customer_reviews.text: I used these at a banquet I presided over. I placed them inside tea light holders and they looked very natural. I received many nice compliments on how beautiful they are.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R.

customer_reviews.title: Safe Lights
customer_reviews.text: All 24 of the lights arrived well packed and in working order. The lights had uniform brightness and had a consistent although somewhat mild flicker. From a few feet away the lights look realistic, especially when in a textured glass votive holder. At $0.58 apiece, nothing to complain about and no fire hazard, especially important if children are present.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great value purchase
customer_reviews.text: These candles really last for a long time. Unlike other candles that say they last for over 100 hours and don't, these really do last for that long. They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Do not give off a warm glow
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and the look of these -- they look like little candles with irregular edges. They do have a nice, realistic flicker as people mentioned in reviews. However, to me and my family the flame gives off light that is mostly white and does not look like a real candle. It is very disappointing, as from the reviews I read it sounded like there was a bit of yellow/warmth to them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These go into my crystal singing bowls to illuminate them during sound baths and they work really well for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cain

customer_reviews.title: Nice electric candle  lights!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little “tea candle” lights. They look real and the batteries they use are not expensive to replace. We really like ours!
customer_reviews.author: Careful Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! I have them everywhere now and they are constantly on. I love candles, but with small children I can’t always have them on.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan:)

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER PURCHAE AND LOVING THEM
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd or fourth order, I use them for something very specific. They go about 14 days 24 hours around the clock. I may just upgrade to the 72 pack. GREAT DEAL AND PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: SPARTEN

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect! Everywhere seemed to only be selling the candles ...
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect! Everywhere seemed to only be selling the candles with the yellow glow, so we were so happy to find these in a warm white. They were absolutely beautiful in the votive holders at my daughter's wedding!
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyFam33

customer_reviews.title: Look beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We had ordered a 12-pack of plastic luminaries so I ordered these to put in them. Of the 24 tealights in the box, only 1 had a dead battery. I replaced the battery and it lit right up! I used 12 in the luminaries, then used the other 12 in the front windows of my house. These tealights looked beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Yarning Around

customer_reviews.title: ... brightness with a slight flicker to make it look like a real candle
customer_reviews.text: These are just the right brightness with a slight flicker to make it look like a real candle. They do look more plastic like but that is mostly hidden once this is put in any type of holder. Hopefully the batteries las as long as expected. They do what’s intended which is provide a little ambiance while adding the safety of no open flame.
customer_reviews.author: Kk

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good value
customer_reviews.text: More realistic than some other flameless tealights, with more of a melted votive look to them. Glad I purchased and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: JLuStew

customer_reviews.title: Nice glow
customer_reviews.text: This are for my wedding in November. They are the perfect fit for my mason jars and other candle holders.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great battery operated candles.
customer_reviews.text: Candles came nicely packaged in a box. Batteries are included, so they are ready to use! Perfect to use for ambiance lighting/decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Buy 'em!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are awesome! Buy them, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Spammela

customer_reviews.title: These Tea Lights DO NOT have the timer feature
customer_reviews.text: When I did a search for Tea Light with Timer these came up. I ordered them. They don't have a timer. Didn't read carefully enough. Trusted the search results.
customer_reviews.author: SDC

customer_reviews.title: So realistic
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! The flickering was so cute and they had an awesomely realistic appearance!
customer_reviews.author: J. Frobish

customer_reviews.title: Love how they flicker
customer_reviews.text: Saw these at a friend's house and had to have. I thought they were real (from a distance) because they flicker at varying times. So happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Somers

customer_reviews.title: So far so good........
customer_reviews.text: As described. Color is good but not perfect - still has some of that green in it, hence one star off......nice little flicker however. NOTE: these are too tall for some votives that are designed for the short tea lights.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Learning

customer_reviews.title: so many uses
customer_reviews.text: These flameless candles are safe around children and pets. Can be used indoor or out - long lasting light for ambiance, power outages, camping, or night light.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Macisco

customer_reviews.title: They don't give out much light but they aren't supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Batteries can be cheaply bought online....the lights will last pretty long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Good quality for the price. Happy with this purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: whocares

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Tea Light
customer_reviews.text: Just love these little tea lights. The size is just right, and they look much more realistic than others I've purchased. I like the box packaging as it makes the candles easy to store. The frosting on the cake is the flicker of the flame. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They flicker like real candles
customer_reviews.text: We always use real candles in our decor because the battery-operated ones are not usually bright enough, but this venue did not allow them. These Homemory battery LED lights looked so real, unless you looked very closely, you could not tell the difference. They lit up the room beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: We've used this for camping, and most recently around the house. Perfect, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Katerina Burianova

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and last a long long time
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with these. Turn them on and they last for like a week straight. So impressed! I will definitely buy more when these run out!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, good bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered just one box to see how they’d turn out. In my opinion, they’re more Beautiful in person, and great for the price! You Wouldn’t even be able to take tell they’re frameless from afar because they’re so bright! Will be ordering a few more boxes, soon!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Vale

customer_reviews.title: Great candles
customer_reviews.text: I think these were great! No more ridiculous real candles. I use these for all my events!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is cheaper to replace the tea lights then buy a new battery for them. These tea lights are very "real" looking, like a candle. I love the white color flame opposed to the yellow on most battery operated tea lights. I will be purchasing more of these for myself and for my daughters homes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Priestley

customer_reviews.title: Received timely, look good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten a chance to use them very much, but they seem to be what I expected and work well.
customer_reviews.author: KJA

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/off switch (didn't need timer)
customer_reviews.text: Easy on/off switch (didn't need timer), nice shape and perfect size to stand alone or place in containers. Light is a nice soft glow, yellow/white, not too bright, and much more natural than any I've seen. Will post photo after Sept. 1 wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Haefner

customer_reviews.title: Great brightness
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I take them on vacation and have them all around my house
customer_reviews.author: lsilvia

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Price & Style is good Hope the battery lasts long bc they’re just a pain to replace
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Description includes the term 'votive', but these are not votive size
customer_reviews.text: I just quick shipped these to use for a memorial service thinking they were votive size, but they are not, they are tea light size. Just wanted to make folks aware so that they won't make the mistake I did. That said, they look nice; I don't have a complaint about the item itself, just the description.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for weddings!
customer_reviews.text: Great for weddings! Very nice soft white flickering light that imitates candlelight. We used them in votives for a 50th anniversary party.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the tea light. The color does not look like a natural flame, it is a cool white instead. I expected warm white, natural looking tea lights as pictured and described in the ad. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Great for Decor
customer_reviews.text: Great for formal parties because they are small and with many of them you can create a great layout.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute lights
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They’re the perfect warm white. They’re smaller then I expected but in a good way. They all worked besides one but after I changed the battery, it worked good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good little light
customer_reviews.text: I’m very surprised at how long these last. I turn them on at night and I forgot to turn one off and when I went to turn them all on like I usually do, the one I left on was still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but...
customer_reviews.text: These tea lights were exactly what I wanted. All 24 work perfectly out of the box. The reason for the missing star is because I paid extra for next day delivery, which didn't happen. These turned out to be 48 hour tea lights rather than 24 hour. So be forewarned if you have a deadline, and order accordingly. Otherwise you should be happy with them - nice safe, flickering light.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used them yet, but they are ideal for our purpose
customer_reviews.text: They are just what I needed: inexpensive, functional, very nice. they will be luminaries for a pathway into our woods as we have a gathering to say goodbye to our property and years of Christmas trees.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Kope

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: They're lightweight, and you can stash them in your luggage to have night lights wherever you go. There is a switch on the bottom where you can turn them on and off, and so they do last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Muramatsu79

customer_reviews.title: Height & looks.
customer_reviews.text: Bought theses candles for a Christmas project. They seem to be the perfect size needed. Will be placed in a jar for the Christmas season. Have not lit one yet but they look very nice in the jars we made.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford J Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These candles look cheap. You can literally see through to the internal workings. Does not look like a real candle. Taking a loss on shipping but I'm returning them. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Karna

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Smaller than I thought but got the job done. They all worked ! They are very nice and were a great touch at our wedding
customer_reviews.author: antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift to our mother and she is thrilled with how much they resemble real candles with their size and flickering. She loves them and uses them in a variety of ways. Terrific product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great! I used them for my Halloween pumpkins and never turned them off... lasted about 15 days outside!
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: They were illuminating
customer_reviews.text: We used them as luminaries to light our halloween trail at our nature center.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They all worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wedding. I was pleasantly surprised that every single one worked.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Green

customer_reviews.title: Correct size for tea lights and very bright
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Lights are the standard tea light size and very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Novemba

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great but you can see the battery through them at certain angles
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cox

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these hoping to use them for my daughter's wedding, but the color is very yellow. They are very bright and the flicker looks realistic, but the color is very distracting. I will be returning these and hope to find something with a better color.
customer_reviews.author: Kent McCammon

customer_reviews.title: Candle light deco
customer_reviews.text: I used them in holiday decorations. I was very satisfied with the candles. They gave off a peculiar smell when I first opened the box. I don't know what that was about.
customer_reviews.author: Esther  S.

customer_reviews.title: Awful blue/white light
customer_reviews.text: I realize these aren't real candles, but honestly! The LED light is so blue/white that it looks like a florescent bulb! The complete lack of consideration of this detail makes this product useless. Manufacturer should be ashamed to even put this product on the market. Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Zuschlag

customer_reviews.title: ... my living room three decor but I do not like that I have to keep turning them off and ...
customer_reviews.text: I give three stars because I wanted these for my living room three decor but I do not like that I have to keep turning them off and on. I forget to do that and the battery died in three days.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Theses lights are wonderful and the price is right. So hard to find them in the store. They were delivered quickly and used them constantly over the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: patty clay

customer_reviews.title: Hardy and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a preschool project, and they held up to the amount of use and abuse from a class of 3-5 year olds
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Shepard

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking for the price. These are being used in a playhouse/ dinner theater. batteries seem to be holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Educated Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Little lights
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized lights to put in my luminaries for my garden. Good size and brightness.
customer_reviews.author: kimothy

customer_reviews.title: Nice little candles
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 packs and only 1 candle didn't work. These are nice little candles! Hope the flame lasts for my wedding reception this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent burn time! Still working...even the 3 that I placed outside in December and it's almost 9 months later!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Twinkle twinkle little lights
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I was looking for an affordable tea light as an accent to my wedding decor. Everything in the craft stores were extremely expensive and/ or looked cheesy and cheap. They were well boxed and all lights worked, bought 2 boxes. Highly recommend and they truly give an illusion of a real candle.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Dann
